医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
BEND4的表观遗传沉默揭示了PDAC治疗的新途径胰腺癌治疗领域的一项新发现揭示了 BEND4 的表观遗传沉默可作为潜在的合成致死标记，用于增强 ATM 抑制剂在胰腺癌治疗中的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Epigenic-silencing-of-BEND4-unveils-new-path-for-PDAC-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Epigenic-silencing-of-BEND4-unveils-new-path-for-PDAC-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fced3c67-f45f-4583-a57b-59963f6eefa1 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 00:00:43 -0500 Epigenetic silencing of BEND4 unveils new path for PDAC treatment
新的 SCLC 生物标志物推动精准医学方法的进步2024年10月11日，Oncotarget第15卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“Relationship Between the Expressions of DLL3, ASC1, TTF-1 and Ki-67: First Steps of Precision Medicine at SCLC” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-SCLC-biomarkers-enable-advances-in- precision-medicine-approaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-SCLC-biomarkers-enable-advances-in- precision-medicine-approaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1496fc48-646b-4591-80ce-7f18e37f57c6 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 23:56:02 -0500 New SCLC biomarkers enable advances in precision medicine approaches
Leritrelvir 对 SARS-CoV-2 蛋白酶突变表现出高效能在过去的几年里，导致 COVID-19 的 SARS-CoV-2 病毒发生了重大变化，从最初的野生型毒株进化为高度传播的 Omicron 变种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Leritrelvir-shows-high-efficacy-against-SARS-CoV-2-protease-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Leritrelvir-shows-high-efficacy-against-SARS-CoV-2-protease-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffb7711a-65e8-4093-b8e9-d5051e00d807 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 23:52:04 -0500 Leritrelvir shows high efficacy against SARS-CoV-2 protease mutations
新兴疗法改变自身免疫性肝炎的治疗方法自身免疫性肝炎 (AIH) 是一种慢性进行性肝脏疾病，由针对肝脏的免疫系统失调引起。如果不治疗，AIH 可能导致严重的并发症，包括肝硬化和肝功能衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Emerging-therapies-transform-autoimmune-hepatitis-treatment-approaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Emerging-therapies-transform-autoimmune-hepatitis-treatment-approaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52a0a353-3402-4d13-8a56-62fadf2d760e Wed, 06 Nov 2024 23:45:00 -0500 Emerging therapies transform autoimmune hepatitis treatment approaches
新指南强调子宫肌瘤的非手术治疗子宫肌瘤是一种常见疾病，影响高达 80% 的女性一生。这些女性中近一半会出现影响生活质量和生育能力的症状，包括剧烈疼痛和贫血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-guidelines-emphasize-non-surgical-treatments-for-uterine-纤维瘤.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-guidelines-emphasize-non-surgical-treatments-for-uterine-filoid.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dcbf98c-f6b5-4f60-878f-8c33d7e2030a Wed, 06 Nov 2024 23:36:58 -0500 New guidelines emphasize non-surgical treatments for uterine fibroids
电风扇可缓解湿热环境下老年人的心脏疲劳悉尼大学和蒙特利尔心脏研究所的最新合作研究表明，在炎热潮湿的天气中使用风扇可以减轻老年人的心脏负担，这与美国疾病控制和预防中心的建议相矛盾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Electric-fans-ease-heart-strain-for-older-adults-in-humid-heat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Electric-fans-ease-heart-strain-for-older-adults-in-humid-heat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8e1958b-a910-4e78-ab26-3d231dd78bbd Wed, 06 Nov 2024 23:27:34 -0500 Electric fans ease heart strain for older adults in humid heat
研究发现每天额外运动五分钟可以降低血压伦敦大学学院和英国伦敦大学研究人员的一项新研究发现，在日常生活中增加少量运动，例如爬楼梯或骑自行车去商店，可能有助于降低血压，每天只需多运动五分钟，估计就会产生改善。悉尼。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/五分钟-of-extra-exercise-a-day-could-lower-blood-Pressure-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/五分钟-of-extra-exercise-a-day-could-lower-blood-Pressure-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=530bcde6-05e8-44ce-992d-0ed479ef558e Wed, 06 Nov 2024 23:22:07 -0500 Five minutes of extra exercise a day could lower blood pressure, study finds
通过基于 ctDNA 的 MRD 检测评估 NSCLC 患者的复发风险在可手术的非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 中，通过循环肿瘤 DNA (ctDNA) 进行分子残留病 (MRD) 检测已成为识别疾病复发高风险个体并可能指导辅助治疗决策的一种有前途的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Assessing-recurrence-risk-with-ctDNA-based-MRD-detection-in-NSCLC-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Assessing-recurrence-risk-with-ctDNA-based-MRD-detection-in-NSCLC-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0135ed2b-f853-4f4b-b50d-804e8b850357 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 23:13:11 -0500 Assessing recurrence risk with ctDNA-based MRD detection in NSCLC patients
肾脏疾病中体重相关问题的全球挑战日本一项为期 14 年的全国性新研究显示，患有终末期肾病 (ESKD) 的患者超重和肥胖呈上升趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/The-global-challenge-of-weight-lated-issues-in-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/The-global-challenge-of-weight-lated-issues-in-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f00a3f8-56ad-42f9-b8f4-29498a1302d8 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 23:06:05 -0500 The global challenge of weight-related issues in kidney disease
揭示 COVID-19 对年轻人的心理影响2019 年底开始的 COVID-19 大流行给全世界的个人和社会（包括儿童和青少年）带来了巨大的破坏。除了直接的身体健康影响外，这种流行病还对心理健康产生了深远的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Unraveling-the-psychological-impact-of-COVID-19-on-young-minds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Unraveling-the-psychological-impact-of-COVID-19-on-young-minds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dac7586f-e6db-4c65-9f47-76a8c7a874db Wed, 06 Nov 2024 22:56:00 -0500 Unraveling the psychological impact of COVID-19 on young minds
